scripts.migadd: cd backend/src/IGS.WebAPI && dotnet ef migrations add AddUserRegistrationFields --project ../IGS.Infrastructure/IGS.Infrastructure.csproj --startup-project ../IGS.WebAPI/IGS.WebAPI.csproj
scripts.migup: cd backend/src/IGS.WebAPI && dotnet ef database update --project ../IGS.Infrastructure/IGS.Infrastructure.csproj --startup-project ../IGS.WebAPI/IGS.WebAPI.csproj
